Income Tax Advocate // Income Tax practitioner // G.S.T practitioner

About Myself

A total of 23 years of experience as Income Tax Advocate. Practicing in the city of Bhagalpur. Specializing in the field of Personal Income Tax Return, Partnership Taxation, Tax Compliance, Property Tax, Estate Tax Planning, Corporate Tax, Tax Advisory, Tax Law, Financial Analysis, Project Finance, Public Finance, Financial Risk, Financial Audits, Economics, Indian Taxation, Project Report for Finance, Income Tax scrutiny. Along with Tax research.

Proactively Engaged with GST Compliance and GST Return

Academic Qualification

Ph.D in Money Market, TilkaManjhi Bhagalpur University

Objective of the study to to provide an overall framework of money market. To to trace historical growth and development of money market. To ecord the growth and development of Indian Money Market. To study General characteristics of money market instrument. To analyse the evolution of call loan operation in India. To know the conceptual framework of treasury bills. To describe the operational guidelines for bill re-discounting scheme. To discuss certificate of deposits.To tudy commercial papers and their guildlines and other current money market instruments currently in vogue in India. To examine money market instrument which are extensively used in developed money markets the world over. To assess the role of various institutions operating in Indian money market. To probe in detail the investment option available to money market mutual fund on various money market instrument and secondary market for these instruments.
